section.name: QuickStart
section.p: The easiest way to get started with the AuditConsole is most likely by using the standalone distribution. It is available at
and comes bundled with an Apache Tomcat.
The steps to deploy this standalone version are pretty simple:

ol.li:
Unzip the file to a location of your choice, e.g. /opt. This will create the directory /opt/AuditConsole
cd /opt unzip /path/to/AuditConsole-0.3b-standalone.zip

section.div: The steps above leave you with an AuditConsole which is instantly ready to run. In order to start the console follow these steps:
